stories.text:
My wife and I do Mr & Mrs Claus for local kids. Obviously I ask the kids what they want, and some of the answers are very interesting.

Because of COVID last year we had to do it virtually, as we did not want kids to miss out on their opportunity to talk with the Claus's. It was tough, but the joy in the kids eyes made it all worth while.

Again this year we are going to be going virtual. I do not like it, but it is the only practical solution given the new variant.

I realize there is a whole community out there that has not had this opportunity, so I ask you: What would you like or need this year?
